text: Born to Be Heiled is the sixth full-length album by the Industrial metal band Hanzel und Gretyl. It was released on Metropolis Records, on November 27, 2012. == Track listing == == Personnel == * Kaizer Von Loopy – vocals, guitar, programming * Vas Kallas – lead vocals, bass == External links == *Official Hanzel Und Gretyl Website *Official MySpace page *Metropolis Records Category:Hanzel und Gretyl albums Category:2012 albums Category:German- language albums Category:Metropolis Records albums
title: Born to Be Heiled
